医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
2019 年美洲 569,000 人因抗生素耐药性死亡根据发表在《柳叶刀区域卫生-美洲》上的一篇新的同行评审论文，世卫组织美洲区域所有 35 个国家中有 569,000 人死亡与细菌耐药性 (AMR) 有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Antimicrobial-resistance-linked-to-569000-deaths-in-the-Americas-in-2019.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Antimicrobial-resistance-linked-to-569000-deaths-in-the-Americas-in-2019.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22fa8b5c-ca8f-4c77-9348-b11741fdc6bd Tue, 08 Aug 2023 23:13:00 -0400 Antimicrobial resistance linked to 569,000 deaths in the Americas in 2019
研究发现莱姆病细菌在变异水平上适应动物宿主一项研究探讨了导致莱姆病的细菌遗传变异背后的机制。莱姆病是美国最常见的媒介传播疾病，每年约有 476,000 例人类病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Lyme-disease-bacteria-adapt-to-animal-hosts-at-the-variant-level-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Lyme-disease-bacteria-adapt-to-animal-hosts-at-the-variant-level-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38847ca3-1f8f-4833-b6c9-817de2fc4743 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 23:07:03 -0400 Lyme disease bacteria adapt to animal hosts at the variant level, study finds
肝病相关研究中的空间分辨巨噬细胞表型分析这篇综述手稿强调了空间分辨巨噬细胞表型在肝病相关研究中的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Spatially-resolved-macrophage-phenotyping-in-liver-disease-lated-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Spatially-resolved-macrophage-phenotyping-in-liver-disease-lated-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee37b39b-68f8-4e76-915a-b36d2d5ba407 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:54:00 -0400 Spatially-resolved macrophage phenotyping in liver disease-related research
含糖饮料与肝癌和慢性肝病死亡率增加的风险有关大约 65% 的美国成年人每天饮用含糖饮料。慢性肝病是全世界发病和死亡的主要原因，可导致肝癌和肝病相关死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Sugar-sweetened-beverages-linked-to-increased-risk-of-liver-cancer-and-chronic-liver-disease-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Sugar-sweetened-beverages-linked-to-increased-risk-of-liver-cancer-and-chronic-liver-disease-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e89b5864-b04a-4c3b-9ee3-992088933acc Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:48:00 -0400 Sugar-sweetened beverages linked to increased risk of liver cancer and chronic liver disease mortality
被监禁妇女在获取经期卫生用品方面面临挑战一项新的研究表明，在被监禁的女性中，许多人必须通过交易或易货才能获得经期卫生用品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Incarcerated-women-face-challenges-in-accessing-menstrual-hygiene-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Incarcerated-women-face-challenges-in-accessing-menstrual-hygiene-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0de2f219-e34a-4e6e-825a-65d3fc0b4bc1 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:47:00 -0400 Incarcerated women face challenges in accessing menstrual hygiene products
新指南为减少麻醉护理中的用药错误提供了明确的建议《麻醉》（麻醉师协会杂志）上发表的新指南提供了明确的建议，以减少涉及麻醉护理中常规使用的注射药物的所有步骤中可避免的错误。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/New-guidance-provides-clear-advice-to-reduce-medication-errors-in-anesthesia-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/New-guidance-provides-clear-advice-to-reduce-medication-errors-in-anesthesia-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=106a4d50-346a-4a4b-b55a-97b42e590477 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:35:15 -0400 New guidance provides clear advice to reduce medication errors in anesthesia care
亚利桑那州癌症中心获得 150 万美元赠款用于癌症预防和控制培训亚利桑那大学癌症中心的研究人员获得了国家癌症研究所 150 万美元的资助，用于为本科生和研究生提供密集的、多学科的癌症预防和控制研究培训项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/UArizona-Cancer-Center-receives-2415-million-grant-for-cancer-prevention-and-control-training.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/UArizona-Cancer-Center-receives-2415-million-grant-for-cancer-prevention-and-control-training.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53413f5f-0e44-4a64-8393-8536282b1ec1 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:29:11 -0400 UArizona Cancer Center receives $1.5 million grant for cancer prevention and control training
步行对于降低死亡风险可能比之前认为的更有效根据对此进行的最大规模的调查分析，您每天应该步行的步数才能开始看到对您的健康的益处，这一数字比之前想象的要低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Walking-may-be-even-more- effective-than-previously-thought-at-reducing-risk-of-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Walking-may-be-even-more- effective-than-previously-thought-at-reducing-risk-of-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d808b720-9136-42cc-ace0-c465cf90664c Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:27:32 -0400 Walking may be even more effective than previously thought at reducing risk of death
400 万美元奖金将帮助研究人员改善亚利桑那州消防员的睡眠健康美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家心肺血液研究所提供了 400 万美元的资助，亚利桑那大学梅尔和伊妮德祖克曼公共卫生学院的研究人员将能够确定成功实施工作场所预防措施的关键因素。睡眠指导可改善亚利桑那州消防员的睡眠健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/244-million-award-will-help-researchers-to-improve-sleep-health-in-Arizona-firefighters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/244-million-award-will-help-researchers-to-improve-sleep-health-in-Arizona-firefighters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7393de80-b098-4e30-b6ed-f0bc8313f82e Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:18:02 -0400 $4 million award will help researchers to improve sleep health in Arizona firefighters
美国心脏协会资助研究评估心血管治疗算法中的种族偏见作为评估当前心血管治疗算法是否存在种族偏见的重点工作的一部分，美国心脏协会（美国心脏和大脑健康研究的最大非政府支持者）正在资助三个新的科学研究项目，每个项目各 5 万美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/American-Heart-Association-funds-research-to-assess-racial-bias-in-cardioangiography-treatment-algorithms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/American-Heart-Association-funds-research-to-assess-racial-bias-in-cardioangio-treatment-algorithms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6453291-bba5-411b-8dc7-b60b8d6afe03 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:12:32 -0400 American Heart Association funds research to assess racial bias in cardiovascular treatment algorithms
